mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (category_id, title, author, password, content) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{title}, #{author}, SHA2(#{password},256), #{content})
INSERT INTO file (article_id, uuid_name, original_name, dir) VALUES (#{articleId}, #{uuidName}, #{originalName}, #{dir})
mapper.select: SELECT a.id, c.id as categoryId, c.name, title, author, password, content, view_count, post_date, edit_date FROM article a INNER JOIN category c ON a.category_id = c.id WHERE a.id = #{articleId}
SELECT c.id, c.article_id, c.comment, c.post_date FROM comment c WHERE article_id = #{articleId}
SELECT id, article_id, uuid_name, original_name, dir FROM file WHERE article_id = #{articleId}
SELECT id, article_id, uuid_name, original_name, dir FROM file WHERE id = #{fileId}
SELECT * FROM comment c WHERE c.id = #{id}
SELECT count(id) FROM article WHERE id = #{id} AND password = SHA2(#{password},256)
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET category_id = #{categoryId}, title = #{title}, author = #{author}, content = #{content}, edit_date = now() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: UPDATE article SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE id = #{articleId}
